Original: 三位闆娘非常親切，每期搭配一本故事、精選10支酒，已經造訪2次，不僅是品酒，和好友小酌之際，一邊閱讀menu的文案、討論故事情節，分享生命經驗，充滿了文青的氣息；此外，所有的餐點都很好吃，尤其此次所點起司臘肉拼盤，令人抁指回味，CP值超高！

Original:
出版業出身的經營者們，以書為主題和引子，作為每一季選酒的企劃發想，因此酒單上除了產地、風味描述外，更把每一隻酒的個性與性格，對照上了書上的每個角色

葡萄酒入門，總是困於產地/風味而不知從何選起，最後往往裝模作樣一番後，還是看著酒標與價錢做選擇，LANDED 的企劃，讓喝葡萄酒更多了一絲浪漫，天地人的平衡裡，文字變成了釀酒師與飲酒者的橋樑

這季的主題式"寶石之國"漫畫，雖然沒有實際看過內容，但選用的酒多為自然酒，展現出平常較為少見的各色光芒，綠、橘、瑰紅，真是像極了愛情(x) 寶石(o)，也因其選酒的豐富性，口味上也多了以往較少體驗到的微酸、甜，甚至有釀造時加了苦艾烈酒的特殊品項，因此還能喝到一絲藥草苦甜，即使是新手，也能開心的探索不同風味（也有特別詢問目前店內單杯品項多達 15 種）

單杯價格上，大概在 350+  ~500+ 左右，另搭配有各式配酒小點，較無主食類的食物，蠻適合作為餐後 Second Round 的場地，拜訪當天，也確實在九點後更為熱鬧起來

店內小而精緻，以吧檯位、兩人位為主，有少量四人位，如果多人聚會的話，可能要再考量場地及空間是否合適

策展式的 wine bar， 處處用心細膩的設計於安排，很推薦不管一個人，或帶著想好好聊天，或可以不用太多話也很安心的朋友，一起造訪 LANDED，用文字與感覺來選一杯今晚與你合適的葡萄酒吧!

p.s.1：消費有低消 500

p.s.2：當季的企劃選書、選酒，在店內都找的到，當然也有做一整支的販售，甚至也有做一整本書的販賣（但這季因為是漫畫，就沒辦法整套銷售了）
EN:
The operators from the publishing industry use the book as the theme and attraction, as a plan for the selection of wine every season, so in addition to the origin and flavor description on the wine list, the personality and personality of each wine is compared with Each role in the book

The entry of wine is always trapped in the place of origin/flavor without knowing where to choose. In the end, after pretending to be used, I still look at the wine label and price for choice. Landed's planning makes drinking wine more romantic. In the balance, the text has become the bridge of the winemaker and the drinker

Although this season's theme "State of Gemstones" comics, although there is no actual reading, the selected wines are mostly natural wines, showing the usual lights that are usually rare, green, orange, and red, which really looks like love (it really looks like love ( X) Gem (O), because of the richness of its wine selection, has more sour and sweet taste that has less experience in the past, and even adds special items of bitter alcoholic wine when brewing, so it can still be able to still use it. Drinking a trace of herbs is bitter and sweet, even a novice can explore different flavors (there are also specially inquiring about 15 types of single cups in the store)

In terms of a single cup, it is about 350+ ~ 500+. It is also matched with various types of wine with a small wine, which is relatively non -main food. It is quite suitable for the venue of the SeCond Round after meal. More lively

The shop is small and exquisite. It is mainly based on the bar and two people. There are a small number of four people. If multiple people meet, you may need to consider whether the venue and space are suitable.

The curatorial Wine Bar is designed with delicate heart everywhere. It is recommended that no matter a person or a good friend who wants to chat well, or you can visit Landed together without spending too much. The wine bars with you tonight!

P.S.1: Consumption is low 500

P.S.2: Selection and wine selection of seasonal planning and wine in the store are found in the store. Of course, there are also a total of selling, and even a whole book sells (but because this season is a comic, there is no way to have no way The whole set of sales)
